Rooms.Name: Opening in a Circle of Trees
Throne of the Champion of Lloth

Objects.Name: spider's fang
Objects.Description: A spider's fang glistens here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This long, wickedly curving pincer is that of a giant spider.  Jet-black andsmooth to the touch, it feels slightly wet and glistens as though freshly hewn.The tip is intensely sharp and tiny spikes of hair barb their way down thelength, making this fang extraordinarily painful to remove once embedded.

Objects.Name: straggling weed
Objects.Description: A straggling weed grows miserably here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This dark green weed has a strong smell of salt about it, similar to seaweed.Although it is limp and unappealing to the eye, it appears it is not impossibleto eat.

Objects.Name: murky pool water
Objects.Description: A murky pool of water stagnates slowly.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This muddy pool of water looks safe to drink despite the unappealingparticles of algae and rotting matter that discolor it.

Objects.Name: rusted dagger
Objects.Description: A rusted dagger protrudes from the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This ancient dagger is still somewhat sharp despite the blood-like patches ofrust that stain the metal.  Light and easily concealed, only the tiny blacksymbol of a spider distinguishes this blade as at all unusual.

Objects.Name: cricket legs
Objects.Description: A pair of cricket legs lie here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: These small green legs are incredibly unappetising to look at, though theyare probably very high in protein and a great source of energy!  Not to mention,the little critters have outstanding ability to survive local predatory toxins.

Objects.Name: primitive fire torch
Objects.Description: A primitive fire torch has been set here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The handle of this torch is made of a very tough dark wood, coated with athin layer of some sticky wax.  In the cup-like holder is stuffed dried mossesand bracken, soaked with a strong smelling resin.

Objects.Name: sharply chiselled key
Objects.Description: A sharply chiselled key has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This little key has been carved from some sort of stiff reed.  The end andnotches have not been smoothed, left almost deliberately spiked.  A frayed bitof twine has been tied loosely around it, enabling it to be worn as a necklace.

Objects.Name: stained bone necklace bones
Objects.Description: @yA necklace of stained bones@g is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This appears to be a simple bit of muddy twine, carefully knotted aroundseveral large sharp bones.  What type and from what sort of creature the bonesoriginate is hard to tell, but the rust-colored stains are unmistakeable.

Objects.Name: dark leathery egg
Objects.Description: A dark leathery egg lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This large round egg is so tough and leathery that it is probably not edible.The hide covering it however is incredibly strong and could potentially be usedfor making armor.

Objects.Name: Fallorain's Plate fallorains fallorain's plate ancient beautiful breastplate
Objects.Description: An ancient but beautiful breastplate lies forgotten here.
Objects.ExtraKeyword: Fallorain's Plate fallorains fallorain's plate ancient beautiful breastplate
Objects.ExtraDescription: Perfectly worked tan leather binds the metal pieces of this plate together.Heavy but thin it is made to cover all of the main vital areas such as thechest, abdomen and groin.  The metal, although old is uncannily beautiful andglitters as though infused with some magic.

Objects.Name: skeleton rotting old
Objects.Description: An old rotting skeleton floats forlornly in the water.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This rotting corpse is so old that nothing is left but bones.  Many of themarks and notches chipped into the bone indicate that this was a warrior whodied in battle.  Stripped of almost everything, it seems that only rags and theweeds still cling to this forgotten carcass.

Objects.Name: tiny silver tag chain
Objects.Description: A tiny tag on a silver chain sparkles here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A somewhat crudely forged silver chain supports this little metal tag.  Onone side the words @DCALIMSHAN'S 12TH CAVALRY BRIGADE@n are engraved, and on theother the tiny sentence @D'Come back to me'@n has been scrawled.

Objects.Name: great trident forked weapon large
Objects.Description: A large forked weapon lies abandoned.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This large trident is tipped at the ends with three terrifyingly sharpspikes.  Several dark smears down the length of each unyielding point testify tothe deadliness of the weapon.

Objects.Name: warrior's longsword shiny blade sword
Objects.Description: A long shiny blade lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This long glistening piece of metal looks ancient though well kept.  A fewnotches have been scratched into the blade where it seems rust stains used tobe, but it is incredibly sharp and well-balanced.

Objects.Name: spiked mace
Objects.Description: A spiked mace has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This heavy pole of metal has a large sphere welded at one end, making itperfect for crushing enemy skulls.  If that weren't deadly enough, it is alsocovered in several intimidating metal spikes almost six inches long.

Objects.Name: old wooden shield
Objects.Description: An old wooden shield lies forgotten here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This shield looks very primitive, roughly hewn from some half rotting treeand fastened crudely onto leather straps, making it easy to wear if not the mostattractive.

Objects.Name: metal wall shield
Objects.Description: A metal wall shield glistens brightly here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This large shield is big enough to provide defense for the entire torso andlegs of a warrior.  Glistening brightly, it has a strange green tint as thoughat one time it were covered with algae.

Objects.Name: smoked meat
Objects.Description: Some smoked meat is here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This is a large slab of red meat, roughly hewn from the carcass of somecreature.  Partially cooked and dried, smoke stains discolor it slightly.

Objects.Name: massive statue frog god
Objects.ShortDescription: the massive statue of a frog god
Objects.Description: The massive statue of a frog god has been erected here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This enormous statue is an amphibious creature, much like a frog but withunusually distorted features.  A crown of bones sits upon its head, and in eachextended webbed hand it holds some humanoid skull.

Objects.Name: several scattered coins
Objects.Description: Several scattered coins glint temptingly on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: These coins all appear to be of current value, though most are encrusted withalgae and varying forms of swamp slime.

Objects.Name: large webbed cocoon
Objects.Description: A large webbed cocoon lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This large cocoon is slightly sticky to the touch.  Wound tightly withspider's thread it seems far too durable to be cut open, though the glisteningstrands likely would not withstand the heat of fire.  It seems the only way torelease the contents would be to burn it.

Objects.Name: crimson-stained crimson stained robe
Objects.Description: A robe lies crumpled here, flecked with red.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This intricately woven robe is made of extraordinarily fine white silk.Long flowing sleeves are hemmed with a single gold thread, and a large hoodtrails down the back.  In perfect condition, the only thing that marrs thebeauty of this garment is the various spatterings of blood that darken it,spreading through the fabric and tinting it crimson red.

Objects.Name: small piece meat
Objects.Description: A small piece of meat has been left to spoil.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This small piece of whitish meat is most likely the flesh of a large birdjudging by the wispy bits of feather that cling to it.  Although not the mostappetising in appearance or smell, it looks nourishing nonetheless.

Objects.Name: smooth piece velvety leather cloak blanket hide
Objects.Description: @mA piece of smooth velvety leather lies forgotten here.@n
Objects.ExtraKeyword: smooth piece velvety leather cloak blanket hide
Objects.ExtraDescription: This large piece of exceptionally beautiful leather is velvety to the touchand a pleasing dark maroon color that shimmers strangely in any light.  Whilethe fabric is easily workable into some form of clothing, it functions just asefficiently as a blanket or wraparound cloak.  The slight unnatural chill to itssurface indicates an inherent ability to ward off magic.

Objects.Name: glistening woven long silk cord
Objects.Description: @WA long cord of woven silk lies glistening here.@n
Objects.ExtraDescription: This delicate cord has been woven from the water spider's fine silk,particularly useful for retaining air bubbles, this potential belt aids agilityand movement within water, making it functional as well as beautiful.

Objects.Name: dark shimmering retina
Objects.Description: @DThe dark retina of an orb spider lies here.@n
Objects.ExtraDescription: This wetly glistening piece of organic tissue is the large retina from one ofthe notoriously perceptive orb spiders.  The magical and inherent properties ofthis flesh are rumored to enhance vision when applied carefully to the eye.

Objects.Name: chunk rich cheese
Objects.Description: A chunk of rich cheese gives off a powerful aroma.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This appears to be a very expensive, and judging by the smell, very agedchunk of cheese.  Obviously the food kept by someone with luxurious tastes.

Objects.Name: juicy cluster red grapes
Objects.ShortDescription: a cluster of juicy red grapes
Objects.Description: A cluster of juicy red grapes has been placed here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: These lush red grapes are perfectly plump and juicy, practically glisteningwith sweet fresh nectar.  Clustered on a newly hewn green vine, these arenothing less than the finest specimen of fruit.

Objects.Name: candleholder dark holder
Objects.Description: A dark candleholder stands elegantly here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This long slick candleholder has been forged by some unnatural means out ofdark crystalline metal.  Designed to hold only one candle, it seems an overlyelaborate design for serving such a menial purpose.

Objects.Name: long black candle xcandlex
Objects.Description: A single black candle stands here.
Objects.ExtraFlags: NoRent, NoDonate, NoInvis, Magic, AntiGood, NoSell
Objects.ExtraDescription: Although it looks ordinary, there is a strange aura around this candle, andan unnatural chill that is the unmistakeable influence of evil magic.

Objects.Name: ragged loincloth filthy pile fabric cloth
Objects.Description: A filthy pile of ragged fabric lies here.
Objects.ExtraKeyword: ragged loincloth filthy pile fabric cloth
Objects.ExtraDescription: This dingy, stained piece of cloth is almost falling apart it looks so oldand used.  Two long pieces of cord hold the more substantially intact piecetogether, but it is barely big enough to cover even the smallest of essentials.

Objects.Name: large webbed cocoon
Objects.Description: A large webbed cocoon lies here
Objects.ExtraDescription: This large coccoon is slightly sticky to the touch.  Wound tightly withspider's thread it seems far too durable to be cut open, though the glisteningstrands likely would not withstand the heat of fire.  It seems the only way torelease the contents would be to burn it.

Objects.Name: water webbing spider gland water
Objects.ShortDescription: the webbing gland of a spider
Objects.Description: The webbing gland of a spider is here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This large, elastic gland was originally used by its spider host to containthe secretions that would solidfy into webbing.  Although the creature hasapparantly no more use for it, this gland is nonetheless as efficient as ever atcontaining any liquids with minimal leaking.

Objects.Name: venommace mace large deadly
Objects.Description: A large and deadly mace glints on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This massive weapon has been made from a pale white metal that glows vaguelyred.  Tiny barbed spikes cover the entire spherical head, tinted black with whatmay be poison or simply dried blood.  Delicate etchings spiral all the wayaround the handle, glowing a brighter crimson and giving the appearance of tinyred spiders crawling around the weapon.

Objects.Name: blood-red shield blood red
Objects.Description: A shield glints red, like a puddle of blood on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This beautiful semi-transparant shield is made of sparkling red beryll,gilded around the edges with magically runed platinum that glows lightly.  Afine chain runs along the inside, delicate but strong enough to use as a handlefor holding the shield to the wearer's arm.

Objects.Name: silvery-webbed leather pants black silver webbed
Objects.Description: A dark pair of leather pants lie here, webbed with silver.
Objects.ExtraKeyword: silvery-webbed leather pants black silver webbed
Objects.ExtraDescription: These slightly stretchy leather pants are glossy black, the many strategicrips looking almost more deliberate than the after-marks of battle.  Finesilvery spider thread webs the garment, glistening strikingly against the darkhide and making it glitter.

Objects.Name: delicate chain mail chainmail shirt
Objects.Description: A glittering piece of fine chainmail has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Tiny sparkling chain rings have been so finely linked together that thisarmor looks almost more like silver shimmering fabric.  Light but incrediblystrong, a strange glow pulses softly through the metal, giving it an eerieappearance that is particularly striking in the dark.

Objects.Name: black spider gloves dark pair leathery
Objects.Description: A dark pair of leathery gloves lie here.
Objects.ExtraKeyword: black spider gloves dark pair leathery
Objects.ExtraDescription: This black piece of leathery material is shaped like a spider, legs splayedso that one extends and caps over each finger, two wrap around the wrist, andone extends up the center of the forearm.  The end of each is tipped with ametal claw, making this potentially lethal as well as protective.  In the centerof the dark hide, a blood-red hourglass symbol blazes, the signature of theblack widow.

Objects.Name: sheer gown heap shadowy shimmering dark fabric
Objects.Description: A heap of shimmering dark fabric lies here.
Objects.ExtraKeyword: sheer gown heap shadowy shimmering dark fabric
Objects.ExtraDescription: Dark and unnatural, this strange shimmering fabric is icy cold to the touchas if it lingers in another realm.  Elegantly beautiful, it has been fashionedto fit female curves perfectly, its semi-transparant look designed to be subtlyrevealing, shrouding much of the wearer's form within the alluring andimaginative realm of shadows.

Objects.Name: long burning black candle drowcandle
Objects.Description: A burning black candle lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Although it looks ordinary, there is a strange aura around this candle, andan unnatural chill that is the unmistakeable influence of evil magic.

Objects.Name: Eilistraee Eilistraee's Pendant silver chain necklace
Objects.Description: A delicate silver necklace glitters here.
Objects.ExtraKeyword: Eilistraee Eilistraee's Pendant silver chain necklace
Objects.ExtraDescription: Fragile and shimmering like starlight, this curvacious teardrop pendant is asymbol of feminine beauty and sadness.  Perfectly smooth, only a tiny glowingname has been engraved into the back - @CEilistraee@n.

Objects.Name: cabinet mahogany
Objects.Description: A mahogany cabinet is fixed to the eastern wall.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Smooth dark wood has been expertly carved to form this elaborately etchedcabinet.  Forms of various spiders cover the entire surface, swirling andblending into each other so that from a distance it looks like a random pattern.A tiny silver keyhole glistens in the door, bordered with several sparkling onyxstones.

Objects.Name: key dark little carved wood
Objects.ShortDescription: a key carved from dark wood
Objects.Description: A little dark key lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This smoothly polished key has been carved from rich mahogany wood and coatedwith a fine layer of sealant wax.  The unmistakeable shape of a spider forms thehandle, two tiny onyx stones set into the wood where its eyes should be.

Objects.Name: silvery-webbed silver red vial
Objects.Description: @RA silvery-webbed red vial lies here.@n
Objects.ExtraDescription: This delicate crystal vial is filled with a sparkling red potion.  A silverycork in the shape of spider seals it, sleek metallic legs clasping thetransparant neck.

Objects.Name: silvery-webbed silver blue vial
Objects.Description: @BA silvery-webbed blue vial lies here.@n
Objects.ExtraDescription: This delicate crystal vial is filled with a sparkling blue potion.  A silverycork in the shape of spider seals it, sleek metallic legs clasping thetransparant neck.

Objects.Name: silvery-webbed silver green vial
Objects.Description: @GA silvery-webbed green vial lies here.@n
Objects.ExtraDescription: This delicate crystal vial is filled with a sparkling green potion.  Asilvery cork in the shape of spider seals it, sleek metallic legs clasping thetransparant neck.

Objects.Name: contraption large mysterious metal machine
Objects.ShortDescription: a large and mysterious metal contraption
Objects.Description: A large and mysterious metal contraption hums noisily.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This large machine makes a considerable noise as its unseen insides whir andclick continuously away.  The only noteworthy external parts are a large metaltray that looks as though it opens and closes, releasing its contents to theinner parts of the machine, also a large nozzle with a shelf placedstrategically beneath it.  A control board with three colored buttons is fixedto the front of the machine.  The red button is inscribed with the word - press,the blue button with switch, and green with turn.            @R _______       @B  ________       @G  ______@n          @R  |       |   @B    |        |    @G   |      |@n          @R  | @nPRESS@R |   @B    | @nSWITCH@B |      @G | @nTURN@G |@n           @R |_______|     @B  |________|    @G   |______|@n

Objects.Name: water silvery-webbed clear silver empty vial water
Objects.Description: A silvery-webbed clear vial is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This delicate crystal vial has obviously been made to hold some magicalsubstance, judging by its powerful aura.  A silvery cork in the shape of spiderseals it, sleek metallic legs clasping the transparant neck.

Objects.Name: long sticky flesh albino frog's tongue
Objects.ShortDescription: a long, sticky bit of flesh
Objects.Description: A long, sticky bit of flesh is lying here.
Objects.ExtraKeyword: long sticky flesh albino frog's tongue
Objects.ExtraDescription: This long strip of flesh looks to be the sickly pink tongue of an albinofrog.  This creature is increasingly rare, due to high demand for various partsof its anatomy, most of which are rumored to have powerful magical properties.

Objects.Name: sealed beaker dark blood
Objects.ShortDescription: a sealed beaker of dark blood
Objects.Description: A sealed beaker of dark blood stands here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Almost black in color, this glass beaker holds the blood of a creature thatis clearly not human.  A strange chill creeps through the container, and aslightly shimmering aura betrays the inherent magic of this substance.

Objects.Name: silvery-webbed silver black vial
Objects.Description: @DA silvery-webbed black vial lies here.@n
Objects.ExtraDescription: This delicate crystal vial is filled with an ominous black potion.  A silverycork in the shape of spider seals it, sleek metallic legs clasping thetransparant neck.

Objects.Name: old leather book ruby
Objects.ShortDescription: a leather book inset with a ruby
Objects.Description: An old leather book gathers dust here.

Objects.Name: old leather book sapphire
Objects.ShortDescription: a leather book inset with a sapphire
Objects.Description: An old leather book gathers dust here.

Objects.Name: old leather book emerald
Objects.ShortDescription: a leather book inset with an emerald
Objects.Description: An old leather book gathers dust here.

Objects.Name: swamp vine
Objects.Description: A swamp vine splays across the ground like an open hand.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This limp plant has the dark green color of spinach, its lethargic trailinglimbs splaying out in all directions in a desperate hunt for richer soil.  Allthat is nourishing in the swamp has been condensed into this sickly pile ofstems and leaves.

Objects.Name: something remember
Objects.Description: Something to remember is left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Oh yeah, you won't forget this!

Objects.Name: crumpled heap gloosy black animal fur
Objects.Description: A crumpled heap of glossy black fur lies here.
Objects.ExtraKeyword: crumpled heap gloosy black animal fur
Objects.ExtraDescription: This long section of beautiful shimmering fur must have once adorned a veryelegant creature indeed, perhaps a black panther judging by the smooth glossyappearance of the fur and incredibly soft dark texture of its leathery interior.Cut into a simple shape and crudely hemmed, it has been fashioned into a sort ofrobe, though the poor quality of the stitching somewhat marrs the incrediblebeauty of the fur itself.

Objects.Name: humanoid skull
Objects.Description: A humanoid skull lies decaying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This yellowing piece of old, hardy bone is still intact, the gruesomefeatures of a humanoid face still visible although empty eye sockets glare whereeyes once were, and rows of jagged teeth are openly exposed, seeming almostabsurdly to be grinning.

Objects.Name: white chainmail arm wrappings armor
Objects.Description: A little pile of white chainmail armor lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Tiny circles of strange metal are perfectly linked to form a glistening pieceof armor that glows vaguely in moonlight.  There is no padding nor real shapeto this armor, made simply to attach at the shoulders and hang protectivelyaround the arms.

Objects.Name: beautiful silvery helmet sleek helm
Objects.Description: A beautiful silvery helmet lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This elegantly forged helm is made from one solid piece of white metal thatlooks almost to beautiful to be used in armor, though it is more than hardyenough to withstand even the heaviest of blows.  Two long grasping pieces curvearound the jaw, holding the piece in place without the need for straps.

Objects.Name: scaley black leather boots
Objects.Description: Some scaley black leather boots lie here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: These roughly stitched boots have been sewn using the black scaley hide ofsome reptile.  Glossy and shimmering, each dark scale is hard yet pliable,making these an excellent set of boots for intense travelling or fighting.

Objects.Name: fireworks
Objects.Description: A colorful firework is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This colorfully wrapped firework has a long dangling fuse, just begging foryou to LIGHT it.

Objects.Name: irridescent webbed ring
Objects.Description: A tiny ring glints delicate shades of green and blue.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Incredibly delicate, this beautiful ring looks to have been woven by masterspider weavers, the fragile sparkling threads treated with some magic tosolidify and glisten with unnatural color.  Shades of blue and green shimmeralong the elegantly curving surfaces, purple and silver adding a darker hue whenthe light catches a certain way.

Objects.Name: tiny bikini top
Objects.Description: A tiny bikini top lies crumpled here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This top basically consists of pieces of pink silk string fastened together.The amount of fabric isn't even enough to use as a handkerchief, so one can onlyimagine how efficient this top is at covering anything!

Objects.Name: skimpy thong miniscule piece fabric
Objects.Description: A miniscule piece of fabric lies on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: No, it isn't a piece of pink dental floss, although one could easily mistakeit for that.  This is in fact, a very skimpy thong, although one wonders if itwould be easier just to go naked!

Objects.Name: bright red lipstick print
Objects.Description: A bright red lipstick print is smeared here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This bright red smear is in the vague shape of a luscious pair of lips.Somebody got kissed!

Objects.Name: pair high stilettos
Objects.Description: A pair of stilettos lie abandoned here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: These strappy stilettos have a good six inch heel on them.  Not only doesthis look incredibly uncomfortable, they'd probably make a deadly weapon!Still...  They're very sexy.

Objects.Name: thick cloud manly scent
Objects.ShortDescription: a thick cloud of manly scent
Objects.Description: A thick cloud of manly scent hovers here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This rich, somewhat pungent odour is obviously that of a man's.  Think sweatysports socks and bellybutton fluff.  Tantalising!

Objects.Name: romantic red rose
Objects.Description: A romantic red rose lies forgotten here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This deep red rose would be quite a romantic flower if it weren't for thestrange, pungent aroma around it.

Objects.Name: big slobbery kiss
Objects.Description: A big slobbery kiss has been smeared on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This is the erotic saliva smear of the biggest, wettest, slobbery kiss youcan imagine.

Objects.Name: summer tree xxtree
Objects.Description: A summer tree stands here, lush and green.

Objects.Name: fall tree xxtree
Objects.Description: A fall tree stands here, colored red and gold.

Objects.Name: winter tree xxtree
Objects.Description: A winter tree is here, bare and hung with ice.

Objects.Name: spring tree xxtree
Objects.Description: A spring tree is here, budding into bloom.
